verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came בִּימֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> bi-Mei And it came to pass in the days אַמְרָפֶ֣ל <S%H569><s%> 'am-ra-Fel of Amraphel מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king שִׁנְעָ֔ר <S%H8152><s%> shin-'Ar, of Shinar אַרְי֖וֹךְ <S%H746><s%> ar-Yoch Arioch מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king אֶלָּסָ֑ר <S%H495><s%> 'el-la-Sar; of Ellasar כְּדָרְלָעֹ֙מֶר֙ <S%H3540><s%> ke-da-re-la-'O-mer Chedorlaomer מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king עֵילָ֔ם <S%H5867><s%> 'ei-Lam, of Elam וְתִדְעָ֖ל <S%H8413><s%> ve-tid-'Al and Tidal מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king גּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim. of nations

עָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su [That these] made מִלְחָמָ֗ה <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah, war אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with בֶּ֙רַע֙ <S%H1298><s%> be-ra' Bera מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king סְדֹ֔ם <S%H5467><s%> se-Dom, of Sodom וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> ve-'Et and with בִּרְשַׁ֖ע <S%H1306><s%> bir-Sha' and with Birsha מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king עֲמֹרָ֑ה <S%H6017><s%> 'a-mo-Rah; of Gomorrah שִׁנְאָ֣ב׀ <S%H8134><s%> shin-'Av Shinab מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king אַדְמָ֗ה <S%H126><s%> 'ad-Mah, of Admah וְשֶׁמְאֵ֙בֶר֙ <S%H8038><s%> ve-shem-'E-ver and Shemeber מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king; צְבֹיִים tze-vo-yim כצְבֹויִ֔ים <S%H6636><s%> tze-vo-Yim, Zeboiim קוּמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> u-Me-lech and the king בֶּ֖לַע <S%H1106><s%> Be-la' of Bela הִיא־ <S%H1931><s%> hi- which is צֹֽעַר׃ <S%H6820><s%> Tzo-'ar. Zoar

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> 'el-leh these חָֽבְר֔וּ <S%H2266><s%> cha-ve-Ru, All these were joined together אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to עֵ֖מֶק <S%H6010><s%> 'E-mek in the vale הַשִּׂדִּ֑ים <S%H7708><s%> has-sid-Dim; of Siddim ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu which יָ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> yam sea הַמֶּֽלַח׃ <S%H4417><s%> ham-Me-lach. is the salt

שְׁתֵּ֤ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Teim both עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh ten שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years עָבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> 'a-ve-Du had served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כְּדָרְלָעֹ֑מֶר <S%H3540><s%> ke-da-re-la-'O-mer; Chedorlaomer וּשְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> u-she-losh- three עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh ten שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah year מָרָֽדוּ׃ <S%H4775><s%> ma-Ra-du. they rebelled

וּבְאַרְבַּע֩ <S%H702><s%> u-ve-'ar-Ba' four עֶשְׂרֵ֨ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh teen שָׁנָ֜ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah year בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> ba came כְדָרְלָעֹ֗מֶר <S%H3540><s%> che-da-re-la-'O-mer, Chedorlaomer וְהַמְּלָכִים֙ <S%H4428><s%> ve-ham-me-la-Chim and the kings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To, for וַיַּכּ֤וּ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Ku that [were] with him and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רְפָאִים֙ <S%H7497><s%> re-fa-'Im the Rephaims בְּעַשְׁתְּרֹ֣ת be-'ash-te-Rot קַרְנַ֔יִם <S%H6255><s%> kar-Na-yim, in Ashteroth Karnaim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַזּוּזִ֖ים <S%H2104><s%> haz-zu-Zim and the Zuzims בְּהָ֑ם <S%H1990><s%> be-Ham; in Ham וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָֽאֵימִ֔ים <S%H368><s%> ha-'ei-Mim, and the Emims בְּשָׁוֵ֖ה <S%H7740><s%> be-sha-Veh Shaveh קִרְיָתָֽיִם׃ <S%H7156><s%> kir-ya-Ta-yim. Kiriathaim

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַחֹרִ֖י <S%H2752><s%> ha-cho-Ri And the Horites בְּהַרְרָ֣ם <S%H2022><s%> be-har-Ram their Mount שֵׂעִ֑יר <S%H8165><s%> se-'Ir; Seir עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad far אֵ֣יל 'eil פָּארָ֔ן <S%H364><s%> pa-Ran, unto Elparan אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- which [is] by הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> ham-mid-Bar. the wilderness

וַ֠יָּשֻׁבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Vai-ya-shu-vu And they returned וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to עֵ֤ין 'ein מִשְׁפָּט֙ <S%H5880><s%> mish-Pat Enmishpat הִ֣וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he קָדֵ֔שׁ <S%H6946><s%> ka-Desh, which [is] Kadesh וַיַּכּ֕וּ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Ku and smote אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all שְׂדֵ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> se-Deh all the country הָעֲמָלֵקִ֑י <S%H6003><s%> ha-'a-ma-lei-Ki; of the Amalekites וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam and also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri, and also the Amorites הַיֹּשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-Shev that dwelt בְּחַֽצְצֹ֥ן be-chatz-Tzon תָּמָֽר׃ <S%H2688><s%> ta-Mar. in Hazezontamar

וַיֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze And there went out מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- the king סְדֹ֜ם <S%H5467><s%> se-Dom of Sodom וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> u-Me-lech and the king עֲמֹרָ֗ה <S%H6017><s%> 'a-mo-Rah, of Gomorrah וּמֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> u-Me-lech and the king אַדְמָה֙ <S%H126><s%> 'ad-Mah of Admah וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> u-Me-lech and the king; צְבֹיִים tze-vo-yim כצְבֹויִ֔ם <S%H6636><s%> tze-vo-Yim, Zeboiim קוּמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> u-Me-lech and the king בֶּ֖לַע <S%H1106><s%> Be-la' of Bela הִוא־ <S%H1931><s%> hi (the same צֹ֑עַר <S%H6820><s%> Tzo-'ar; Zoar וַיַּֽעַרְכ֤וּ <S%H6186><s%> vai-ya-'ar-Chu arrayed אִתָּם֙ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tam against מִלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah, battle בְּעֵ֖מֶק <S%H6010><s%> be-'E-mek with them in the vale הַשִּׂדִּֽים׃ <S%H7708><s%> has-sid-Dim. of Siddim

אֵ֣ת <S%H854><s%> 'et against כְּדָרְלָעֹ֜מֶר <S%H3540><s%> ke-da-re-la-'O-mer With Chedorlaomer מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king עֵילָ֗ם <S%H5867><s%> 'ei-Lam, of Elam וְתִדְעָל֙ <S%H8413><s%> ve-tid-'Al and with Tidal מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim, of nations וְאַמְרָפֶל֙ <S%H569><s%> ve-'am-ra-Fel and Amraphel מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king שִׁנְעָ֔ר <S%H8152><s%> shin-'Ar, of Shinar וְאַרְי֖וֹךְ <S%H746><s%> ve-'ar-Yoch and Arioch מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king אֶלָּסָ֑ר <S%H495><s%> 'el-la-Sar; of Ellasar אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> 'ar-ba-'Ah four מְלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> me-la-Chim kings אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- against הַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H2568><s%> ha-cha-mish-Shah. with five

וְעֵ֣מֶק <S%H6010><s%> ve-'E-mek And the vale הַשִׂדִּ֗ים <S%H7708><s%> ha-sid-Dim, of Siddim בֶּֽאֱרֹ֤ת <S%H875><s%> be-'e-Rot [was full of] בֶּאֱרֹת֙ <S%H875><s%> be-'e-Rot pits חֵמָ֔ר <S%H2564><s%> che-Mar, of tar וַיָּנֻ֛סוּ <S%H5127><s%> vai-ya-Nu-su fled מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- and the kings סְדֹ֥ם <S%H5467><s%> se-Dom of Sodom וַעֲמֹרָ֖ה <S%H6017><s%> va-'a-mo-Rah and Gomorrah וַיִּפְּלוּ־ <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-pe-lu- and fell שָׁ֑מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah; who וְהַנִּשְׁאָרִ֖ים <S%H7604><s%> ve-han-nish-'a-Rim there and they that remained הֶ֥רָה <S%H2022><s%> He-rah to the mountain נָּֽסוּ׃ <S%H5127><s%> Na-su. fled

וַ֠יִּקְחוּ <S%H3947><s%> Vai-yik-chu And they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all רְכֻ֨שׁ <S%H7399><s%> re-Chush all the goods סְדֹ֧ם <S%H5467><s%> se-Dom of Sodom וַעֲמֹרָ֛ה <S%H6017><s%> va-'a-mo-Rah and Gomorrah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all אָכְלָ֖ם <S%H400><s%> 'a-che-Lam and all their victuals וַיֵּלֵֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> vai-ye-Le-chu. and departed

וַיִּקְח֨וּ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Chu And they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ל֧וֹט <S%H3876><s%> Lot Lot וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et רְכֻשׁ֛וֹ <S%H7399><s%> re-chu-Sho and his goods בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son אֲחִ֥י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi brother's אַבְרָ֖ם <S%H87><s%> 'av-Ram Abram's וַיֵּלֵ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> vai-ye-Le-chu; and departed וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he יֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev who dwelt בִּסְדֹֽם׃ <S%H5467><s%> bis-Dom. in Sodom

וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo And there came הַפָּלִ֔יט <S%H6412><s%> hap-pa-Lit, one that had escaped וַיַּגֵּ֖ד <S%H5046><s%> vai-yag-Ged and told לְאַבְרָ֣ם <S%H87><s%> le-'av-Ram Abram הָעִבְרִ֑י <S%H5680><s%> ha-'iv-Ri; the Hebrew וְהוּא֩ <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu now he שֹׁכֵ֨ן <S%H7931><s%> sho-Chen for he dwelt בְּאֵֽלֹנֵ֜י <S%H436><s%> be-'e-lo-Nei in the plain מַמְרֵ֣א <S%H4471><s%> mam-Re of Mamre הָאֱמֹרִ֗י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri, the Amorite אֲחִ֤י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi brother אֶשְׁכֹּל֙ <S%H812><s%> 'esh-Kol of Eshcol וַאֲחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> va-'a-Chi and brother עָנֵ֔ר <S%H6063><s%> 'a-Ner, of Aner וְהֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem and these בַּעֲלֵ֥י <S%H1167><s%> ba-'a-Lei archer בְרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> ve-rit- confederacy אַבְרָֽם׃ <S%H87><s%> 'av-Ram. with Abram

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' heard אַבְרָ֔ם <S%H87><s%> 'av-Ram, And when Abram כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for נִשְׁבָּ֖ה <S%H7617><s%> nish-Bah was taken captive אָחִ֑יו <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv; that his brother וַיָּ֨רֶק <S%H7324><s%> vai-Ya-rek he armed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חֲנִיכָ֜יו <S%H2593><s%> cha-ni-Chav his trained יְלִידֵ֣י <S%H3211><s%> ye-li-Dei [servants] born בֵית֗וֹ <S%H1004><s%> vei-To, in his own house שְׁמֹנָ֤ה <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Nah eight עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen וּשְׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> u-she-Losh three מֵא֔וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot, hundred וַיִּרְדֹּ֖ף <S%H7291><s%> vai-yir-Dof and pursued עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far דָּֽן׃ <S%H1835><s%> Dan. [them] unto Dan

וַיֵּחָלֵ֨ק <S%H2505><s%> vai-ye-cha-Lek And he divided עֲלֵיהֶ֧ם׀ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem against לַ֛יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> Lay-lah by night ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he וַעֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> va-'a-va-Dav himself against them he and his servants וַיַּכֵּ֑ם <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Kem; and smote וַֽיִּרְדְּפֵם֙ <S%H7291><s%> vai-yir-de-Fem them and pursued עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far חוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2327><s%> cho-Vah, them unto Hobah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which מִשְּׂמֹ֖אל <S%H8040><s%> mis-se-Mol which [is] on the left hand לְדַמָּֽשֶׂק׃ <S%H1834><s%> le-dam-Ma-sek. of Damascus

וַיָּ֕שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shev And he brought back אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָרְכֻ֑שׁ <S%H7399><s%> ha-re-Chush; all the goods וְגַם֩ <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam and also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ל֨וֹט <S%H3876><s%> Lot Lot אָחִ֤יו <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv his brother וּרְכֻשׁוֹ֙ <S%H7399><s%> u-re-chu-Sho and his goods הֵשִׁ֔יב <S%H7725><s%> he-Shiv, and also brought again וְגַ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam and also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַנָּשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> han-na-Shim and the women וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am. also and the people

וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze went out מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- And the king סְדֹם֮ <S%H5467><s%> se-Dom of Sodom לִקְרָאתוֹ֒ <S%H7125><s%> lik-ra-To to meet אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei him after שׁוּב֗וֹ <S%H7725><s%> shu-Vo, his return מֵֽהַכּוֹת֙ <S%H5221><s%> me-hak-kOt from the slaughter אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כְּדָר־ ke-dor- לָעֹ֔מֶר <S%H3540><s%> la-'O-mer, of Chedorlaomer וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמְּלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> ham-me-la-Chim and of the kings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who אִתּ֑וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To; for אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- at עֵ֣מֶק <S%H6010><s%> 'E-mek that [were] with him at the valley שָׁוֵ֔ה <S%H7740><s%> sha-Veh, of Shaveh ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu which עֵ֥מֶק <S%H6010><s%> 'E-mek dale הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech. [is] the king's

וּמַלְכִּי־ u-mal-ki- צֶ֙דֶק֙ <S%H4442><s%> tze-dek And Melchizedek מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king שָׁלֵ֔ם <S%H8004><s%> sha-Lem, of Salem הוֹצִ֖יא <S%H3318><s%> ho-Tzi brought forth לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem bread וָיָ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> va-Ya-yin; and wine וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu now he כֹהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> cho-Hen and he [was] the priest לְאֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> le-'El God עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H5945><s%> el-Yon. of the most high
